description.value:
Wondrous item, uncommon
Normally found in a small glass jar containing 1d3 doses, this foul-smelling, greasy yellow substance is made by hags in accordance with an age-old secret recipe. You can use an action to rub one dose of the wax onto an ordinary broom or wooden stick and transform it into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.hFAVm9pTJDm0nu3g]{broom of flying} for 1 hour.
